References AD0BUSY, AD0INT, ADC0_PAGE, ADC0CF, ADC0H, ADC0L, AMX0SL, channel, DISABLE_INTERRUPTS, ENABLE_INTERRUPTS, i, n, SFRPAGE, user_data, value, and yield().

00232 {
00233    unsigned long value;
00234    unsigned int i, n;
00235    float gvalue;
00236 
00237    SFRPAGE = ADC0_PAGE;
00238    AMX0SL = channel & 0x0F;
00239    ADC0CF = 0xE0;               // 16 system clocks, gain 1
00240 
00241    n = 1 << 10;                 // average 1024 times
00242 
00243    value = 0;
00244    for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00245       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00246 
00247       AD0INT = 0;
00248       AD0BUSY = 1;
00249       while (!AD0INT);          // wait until conversion ready, does NOT work with ADBUSY!
00250 
00251       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00252 
00253       value += (ADC0L | (ADC0H << 8));
00254       yield();
00255    }
00256 
00257    value >>= 6;
00258 
00259    if (channel < 2)
00260       gvalue = value / 65536.0 * 20 - 10;       // +- 10V range
00261    else
00262       gvalue = value / 65536.0 * 10;    // 0...10V range
00263 
00264    if (channel == 2 || channel == 3) {
00265       gvalue *= 100;            // 0..5V -> 0..500 mm range
00266       gvalue += user_data.aofs[channel - 2];
00267    }
00268 
00269    DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00270    *d = gvalue;
00271    ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00272 }
